content: The famous 'Mona Lisa' painting resides in which museum located in Paris, France?

The famous 'Mona Lisa' painting resides in the Louvre Museum, which is located in Paris, France. The Louvre is one of the world's largest and most visited museums, housing an extensive collection of art and artifacts from various periods and civilizations. The Mona Lisa, painted by Leonardo da Vinci in the early 16th century, is undoubtedly the museum's most iconic and recognizable piece, attracting millions of visitors each year.
